Summary: triangle low and slow over reno
divs: Sighting Detailsafter watching the 10pm ISS fly over i was putting lawn chairs away when i noticed a low flying aicraft making aturn from swest, i noticed the lights on the craft were ina tiangular shape 2 small white lights on the rear tips and a larger red strobe on the front. it was low about 2-3 thousnd ft. and maybe 2oo mph. no sound. the event lasted 90 sec.iwatched the last part of the sighting with binoculars and could the craft was a dark grey triangle. a bit larger than a c-130 which flew over my house and landed at cannon intr.a few mins. after triangle flew west over reno.
